s0350: Hu Yan Jiu Fan, Wen Gong maternal uncle;
s0354: From Xian Gong for crown prince time, Chong Er already adult.
s0355: Xian Gong ascended position, Chong Er age twenty-one.
s0356: Xian Gong thirteenth year, because Li Ji reason, Chong Er prepared Pu city guarded Qin.
s0357: Xian Gong twenty-first year, Xian Gong killed crown prince Shen Sheng, Li Ji slandered him, feared, not bid farewell Xian Gong guarded Pu city.
s0358: Xian Gong twenty-second year, Xian Gong sent eunuch Lu Di urged kill Chong Er.
s0359: Chong Er climbed wall, eunuch pursued cut his garment sleeve.
s0362: At time Chong Er age forty-three.
s0363: Followed this five scholars, remaining not named several ten people, to Di.
s0364: Di attacked Jiu Ru, obtained two women: with elder daughter wife Chong Er, gave birth Bo Jiao, Shu Liu;
s0365: with younger daughter wife Zhao Shuai, gave birth Dun.
s0366: Resided Di five years Jin Xian Gong died, Li Ke already killed Xi Qi, Dao Zi, then sent people welcome, wished establish Chong Er.
s0367: Chong Er feared killing, because firmly declined, not dare enter.
s0368: Already Jin moreover welcomed his younger brother Yi Wu established him, this was Hui Gong.
s0369: Hui Gong seventh year, feared Chong Er, then sent eunuch Lu Di with brave men wished kill Chong Er.
s0370: Chong Er heard it, then plotted Zhao Shuai etc. said: 'Initially I fled Di, not because it usable with, because near easy pass, so moreover rest feet.
s0371: Rest feet long, firmly wish move to great country.
s0372: Sir Qi Huan Gong good goodness, will in hegemony wang, gather relieve feudal lords.
s0373: Now heard Guan Zhong, Xi Peng died, this also wish obtain worthy assist, why not go?'
s0375: Chong Er told his wife said: 'Wait me twenty-five years not come, then marry.'
s0376: His wife laughed said: 'Plow twenty-five years, my tomb upper cypress big.
s0378: Chong Er resided Di altogether twelve years left.
s0379: Passed Wei, Wei Wen Gong not ritual.
s0380: Left, passed Wu Lu, famine from wild people begged food, wild people filled earth vessel presented him.
s0382: Zhao Shuai said: 'Earth, have land, lord their bow receive it.'
s0384: To Qi, Qi Huan Gong thick ritual, with clan woman wife him, had horses twenty chariots, Chong Er peaceful it.
s0385: Chong Er to Qi two years Huan Gong died, met Shu Dao etc. made inner disorder, Qi Xiao Gong establish, feudal lords troops several arrived.
s0387: Chong Er loved Qi woman, no leave heart.
s0388: Zhao Shuai, Jiu Fan then at mulberry below plotted go.
s0389: Qi woman attendants at mulberry above heard it, informed her master.
s0390: Her master then killed attendants, urged Chong Er hurry go.
s0391: Chong Er said: 'Person life peaceful happy, who know other!
s0392: Must die at this, cannot go.'
s0393: Qi woman said: 'You one country gong zi, poor come here, several scholars with you as life.
s0394: You not quickly return country, repay labor ministers, but cherish woman virtue, secretly for you ashamed.
s0395: Moreover not seek, what time obtain merit?'
s0396: Then with Zhao Shuai etc. plotted, intoxicated Chong Er, loaded with go.
s0397: Went far awakened, Chong Er great anger, drew spear wished kill Jiu Fan.
s0398: Jiu Fan said: 'Kill minister complete you, Yan wish.'
s0399: Chong Er said: 'Matter not succeed, I eat maternal uncle clan meat.'
